name: Milk Formula
description:
Single mother who was previously incarcerated is the main caregiver of her 5-year old son. Her elderly parents have been the boy's caregivers but they have been struggling financially and emotionally with housing and recent medical bills (grandma has undergone amputation of toes due to infection caused by diabetes and has been hospitalized for almost a month). As the single mother is still emplaced at a halfway house, she is trying her best to take care of the family during this difficult time. 

As a bulk of the caregiving expenses is for milk formula, she would appreciate support in purchasing it. Her son drinks Nestle Nan Optipro Growing Up Milk Formula - Stage 4, which can be found at NTUC.

name: washer
description: Family of 3 (F62, M61 & M20) staying in a public rental flat in Woodlands is financially tight. Their washing machine is faulty and no longer able to dry spin. They would appreciate a donation/sponsorship for a washing machine.

name: Washing machine
description: Client is a single mother and the primary caregiver of her 13-year-old daughter and elderly mother, both of whom have multiple health conditions. They live in a rental flat, and their washing machine is currently not working.

contact.org: Allkin Family Service Centre @ Cheng San 445
contact.name: Joyce Ng

name: Wheelchair
description: Client is an elderly that has sprained her ankle and unable to walk. The caregiver, her niece is unable to work due to her duties as a caregiver and struggling with seeking a job due to her hearing impairment. They require a wheel chair to aid client in going out and to her medical appointments.

name: walking frame with wheels
description: Client is unable to work due to her mobility issues. A walking frame with wheels will be able to better assist her to practice walking at home and ambulate around her home.

name: Motorized Wheelchair/Scooter
description: Member is a homeless man who got his motorized wheelchair stolen after he was taken to hospital (Wheelchair was left at rough sleeping spot). He has leg issues and is medically unfit for work. He is hoping for a motorized wheelchair so he can have better mobility and will be able to do things such as apply for SSO/go to the bank independently.

name: Motorised Wheelchair
description: elderly lady in her 70s is having difficulty walking and using a normal wheelchair as she is slowly having weak arm strength to wheel herself around as she is usually alone while her son is working long hours

name: Mobility scooter
description: Elderly has just got her feet amputated due to diabetes and she has been feeling helpless with daily functioning. To improve her quality of life, a mobility scooter would be beneficial for her as she enjoys leading an active lifestyle outdoors before the amputation. The family has also been under financial distress due to low income. Do contact Marilyn at 81214654 or marilyn@newlifestories.org.sg for further clarifications. Thank you!

name: iPad
description: Low-income family hopes to receive an iPad for the daughter for school work purposes. Please WhatsApp Fang Ling at 8588 6196 or email to fangling.koh@thkmc.org.sg to liaise.

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Lynette Tan

name: Colouring books and/or alphabet/number tracing books
description:
Community Services & Programmes @ Children’s Society requires Colouring books and/or alphabet/number tracing books for a boy around 1 year 10 months.
Client's request for items that would help her child practice using a pencil and practice writing.
Delivery is required to be arranged by kind donor, please click to donate so that we can get in touch with you soon. We thank you for your kindness in advance!

name: Donation of Laptop
description: Family of 4 are residing in rental flat. Client is diagnozed with stroke. Client is requesting for donation of laptop for his daughter  to use for her HBL session and to acquire her educational goals. Please WhatsApp Selvi at 86661336 or email to tamilselvi@thkmc.org.sg to liaise.

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Lynette Tan

name: Laptop
description:
Client is a 67 years old senior who lives alone, and was forced to retire as a driver, after he got into an accident 3 years ago. 

Senior is presently not receiving any financial assistance, and gets by with quarterly silver support scheme payouts. 

Senior shared that he always wanted a laptop but could not afford it. He wish to learn how to check emails, as well as to watch his YouTube videos on a bigger screen.

name: Handphone
description: We would like to seek donation for a second-hand phone to a single mother of 4 school-going children as her handphone is faulty. She is currently unemployed and face financial limitations.

name: Laptop
description: 53-year-old lady requires a laptop to conduct job search. Her current laptop is faulty.

name: Laptop
description: Family does not have a working laptop and the client’s wife needs it to prepare a resume to help her with her job search. Client is the sole-breadwinner and his income is not sufficient to support the family, therefore they cannot afford to get their own laptop. As they have 2 young special needs children who are not enrolled in school yet, client and his wife intend to search for materials online to help the children in their education too.

name: Laptop and charger
description: Client’s family of 6 with 4 young children, resides in a 2 room HDB rental flat. As client is taking care of her youngest child who will only enter childcare next year, she is unable to work. Client is also undergoing divorce proceedings and is not receiving any financial support from her husband. As such, client is currently reliant on formal systems for financial assistance . Client intends to look for an administrative job in future and would like to request for a laptop as she is unable to afford it. With the laptop, client will be able to practice her IT skills and apply for jobs online.

name: Crown Gas Stove
description: Member is a single mother caregiving for her 10 year old son and mother who is medically unfit for work. The family relies solely on financial assistance due to her caregiver role and her own mother having diagnosed epilepsy and fits requiring her to stay home to care for her. The family requires a single gas stove with installation for their new rental flat as they were recently made to relocate due to en bloc.

name: Adult Diapers [Tena PROskin Pants, Size: XL, 2 packs]
description: The family consists of the client, his wife, their son and wife's mother. Family is facing financial difficulties due to their ongoing medical conditions and caregiving responsibilities of son and grandmother. Grandmother has multiple medical conditions which limits her mobility and the family requires support with her adult diapers.

contact.org: Allkin Family Service Centre @ Cheng San 445
contact.name: Fahmi Bin Jazid

name: Adult Diapers [ID Pants Super XL (Pull Up), 2-3 packs]
description: Family has a young daughter and a 3 year old son and elderly mother to take care of. The sole breadwinner of the family is having difficulties working as he has a pre-existing medical conditions and met with an accident 3 years ago. Their elder mother is diagnosed with multiple medical conditions and has to be on adult diapers. The family is having difficulties coping with the monthly expenses in the family. They require assistance with the adult diapers for their elder mother.

contact.org: Allkin Family Service Centre @ Cheng San 445
contact.name: Fahmi Bin Jazid

name: Adult Pull-Up Diaper L size (any brand)
description: Client is an elderly who is diagnosed with Parkinson and Dementia conditions. She requires full time care from her daughter at home hence, daughter is unable to go out to work. Their savings are depleting quickly to cope with care needs and daily expenses. We are seeking for long term assistance and require sponsorship of Adult Diapers - Pull Up L-Size for the interim period. Thank you.

name: Pocket talker
description:
Client is staying alone and has hearing impairment. She recently lost her hearing aid which makes it hard for her to communicate with the people around her. 

Please contact me at 91134712 if you are keen to donate. Thank you!

name: Adult diapers (Plus size: eg: XL, XXL, XXXL)
description: Family requires support with adult diapers as elderly is reliant on adult diapers. However, they face financial difficulties and has difficulties purchasing enough adult diapers.

name: Adult Diaper (M size, pull up pant)
description: Client is a single parent, taking care of elderly parents and young adult children. Client's parent required diaper for daily use in view of his medical needs.

contact.org: Montfort Care - Kreta Ayer Family Services
contact.name: Rachel Fu

name: Glucometer
description: This is a 63-year-old uncle who is doing his dialysis three times a week. He is staying alone in a rental flat and he needs help with a donated glucometer for his own monitoring of his blood sugar level.   He suffered a fall recently and he is not able to work. Has been on financial assistance for his basic needs and unable to afford a glucometer.

name: Glucose Meter
description: This is a family of 7 with 5 children. Both parents have medical concerns and are unfit for work. Most recently, the children's father was admitted to hospital after collapsing. He underwent biopsy and was advised to have a glucose meter at home. The family face financial limitations with limited income and medical concerns.

name: Safety shoes
description: Beneficiary is a single man in his early 20s, with no family. He has been surviving on his own since he was in his teens. He is currently homeless and unemployed, mainly due to his mental health issues. He managed to get a job as a warehouse assistant, but is required to purchase his own safety shoes, vest and gloves. He is unable to start work unless he has these items.

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bukit Panjang
contact.name: Muhammad Idris Bin Mohd Margono
